attributes.action: Make random drug testing compulsory for claiming benefits in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
more details and statistics are available - 

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/315256/benefit-claimants-drug-alcohol-condition.pdf
attributes.background:
Within the UK most people are subject to random drug testing in the work place so why shouldn't people taking out the pot of benefits be subject to the same.

We have to to earn it, so should they for claiming it

rejection.details: It is clear that you think that people who claim benefits should have to be tested for drugs, but not sure what action you believe should ollow if someone tests positive for drug use.
